module.name: FreePBX FOP Framework
module.changelog: *2.8.0.6* #4602 *2.8.0.5* #4429, #4185 *2.8.0.4* reverting 2.8.0.3 fixed elsewhere *2.8.0.3* #4388 *2.8.0.2* #4381 *2.8.0.1* #4269, remove uninitialized variable *2.8.0.0* install script fixes when used with install_amp *2.7.0.0* bumped *2.6.0.3* #3883, #3278, #3295 *2.6.0.2* #3740 FOP 0.30 (Asterisk 1.6 compatible) *2.6.0.1* changed to pull from 2.6 branch *2.6.0.0* misc *2.5.0.1* typo in install script *2.5.0* First release of fw_fop
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the FOP code that is not otherwise housed in a module, it used to be part of framework but has been removed to isolate FOP from Framework updates.
